name: SUPERCHARGER
description:
I couldn't afford ultrakill so I made my own, just like everybody else...

Run around the center of a super collider throwing battery men into the core to get some bonus loot.

harder and more brutal waves will spawn that you can defeat, and then throw into the collider. 

this is all in preparation for Eric...

Playtime 5mins average play session - longer if you die a lot
